attributes.action: use more eco-friendly modes of transport, such as hybrid motor cars and bicycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government are clearly against individuals driving cars that, in the opinion of some people, are not kind to the environment, such as 4-wheel drives and saloons.

Whilst the government continues to support this view, it is not acceptable that our leaders and senior civil servants continue to be chauffeur driven in large executive 'gas-guzzlers'.

I therefore propose that these cars are replaced by the 'eco-friendly' hybrid cars, thus leading by example and minimising the obscene levels of hypocracy that is prevalent in this present government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
